dmca.title: Mir Internet Marketing Claims Copyright Infringement (#31)
dmca.body:
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
[private]
Chicago, Illinois 60607

December 17, 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on
   http://www.internetmadeeasy.com/web-applications-development

   Search Query: "content is the ability to deliver on-the-fly website content, based"
   
   Infringing Web Pages: 
   http://www.mmwebdesign.net/solutions.html

2. My Contact Information: cnewton@intenetmadeeasy.com

3. Infringer's Contact Information:
   MM Web Design 
   EMAIL: [private]@mmwebdesign.net

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[private], CEO 
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
p. (xxx)xxx-xxxx
e. [private]@internetmadeeasy.com
